what is npviewer? its using alot CPU: am trying to kill it

From forum - npviewer.bin is Firefox's Adobe Flash Player plugin. Whenever you have issues with firefox freezing on a page with flash animations try to force quit that process instead. There is a good chance firefox will resume responding and you will merely have to reload the page to get the flash animation back.
